doc.field: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
creation: circa 1851; alteration: circa 1857; alteration: circa 1900; alteration: 1907; alteration: 1942
Hard Acre--Office Hill--Rev Edgar Woods Home 1890--son Samuel Baker Wood Home 1892--An older foundation in the cellar could be home of Dr Charles E & Frances E Meriwether circa 1828

2 Story Frame, 2 Pile, 6/6, Blinds, Brackets, Brick Nogging, Pitsaw Marks, Reciprocating Saw Marks, Cut Nails with Stamped Heads, Beaded Siding, Blinds, Bay Window, Triangular Lintels, 6 Course American Bond, 7 Course American Bond, Penciling, Wood Shingles, Wood Box Lock, Board & Batten Cottage, Depot, Kitchen, Smokehouse/Dairy, School, Barn, Stable, Carriage House with Icehouse, Cemetery, Parterres
survey data: National Register of Historic Places--Virginia Landmarks Register--Work Projects Administration
